title: Exploring New Zealand's fiordland
creator_credit: Stanhope Andrews and New Zealand National Film Unit
brief_description: A joint expedition of New Zealand and American research workers into New Zealand’s fiordlands to study fauna and flora and to prepare maps of the area. Narrated by Briton Chadwick.
creator_credit_for_label: Stanhope Andrews and New Zealand National Film Unit
description: A joint expedition of New Zealand and American research workers into New Zealand’s fiordlands to study fauna and flora and to prepare maps of the area. Narrated by Briton Chadwick.
